faqs.question: What is IntentX?
faqs.answer: IntentX is an intent-based DeFi aggregator that allows users to describe their financial goals in natural language and automatically executes them across multiple blockchains. It combines DEX trading, lending/borrowing, and staking in one unified interface.

faqs.question: How does intent parsing work?
faqs.answer: Simply describe your goal in plain English in the Intent Lab. Our AI breaks it down into executable steps, estimates gas costs, and shows you a preview before execution. Examples: 'Swap 100 USDC for ETH', 'Stake 50 ETH in Lido', 'Supply 5000 USDC to Aave'.

faqs.question: What are the supported DeFi primitives?
faqs.answer: IntentX supports three core primitives: (1) DEX Trading - swap tokens using AMM protocols, (2) Lending/Borrowing - supply assets to earn interest or borrow against collateral, (3) Staking - earn rewards by staking tokens in various vaults.

faqs.question: Which networks are supported?
faqs.answer: IntentX operates on 4 networks: BlockDAG Testnet (primary), Ethereum Goerli, Polygon Mumbai, and Hardhat Local (development). Select your preferred network using the network selector in the navbar.

faqs.question: How are transactions optimized?
faqs.answer: IntentX uses batch processing, multi-hop routing, and smart protocol selection to minimize gas costs. We achieve sub-2 second perceived execution times through optimistic UI updates and efficient transaction bundling.

faqs.question: What are the vault APYs?
faqs.answer: Our 6 vaults offer competitive yields: ETH Staking (5.2%), WETH Staking (5.8%), stETH Staking (18.5%), USDC Lending (7.2%), DAI Lending (6.8%), USDT Lending (7.5%). APYs are variable and subject to market conditions.

faqs.question: What are the security features?
faqs.answer: Security is paramount. We use audited smart contracts, multi-sig governance, non-custodial wallet integration, gas-safe patterns, proper access controls, and real-time risk monitoring. Always verify transactions before execution.

faqs.question: How is gas saved calculated?
faqs.answer: Gas savings are calculated by comparing your optimized route vs. a standard single-protocol approach. Multi-hop routing and batching typically save 20-40% in gas fees. Actual savings depend on market conditions and transaction complexity.

faqs.question: How do I connect my wallet?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Connect Wallet' button in the top-right navbar. MetaMask will open - select your account, approve the connection, and you'll be ready to create intents and execute transactions. Your private keys never leave your device.

faqs.question: What are the borrow requirements?
faqs.answer: To borrow, you must first supply collateral. Our lending pools use a 75% LTV (Loan-to-Value) ratio, meaning you can borrow up to 75% of your collateral value. Interest rates are 3-8% depending on the asset.

strategyHints.title: Maximize Yield
strategyHints.description: Stack high-APY vaults: Start with stETH (18.5%), then diversify into USDT lending (7.5%) for stability.

strategyHints.title: Conservative Approach
strategyHints.description: Focus on stables: USDC/DAI lending (6.8-7.2%) with lower volatility. Pair with 50% ETH staking (5.2%) for balanced returns.

strategyHints.title: Growth Strategy
strategyHints.description: Use leverage: Supply stables as collateral, borrow for trading, deploy in high-yield vaults. Requires active monitoring.

strategyHints.title: Gas Optimization
strategyHints.description: Batch operations: Group swaps/staking in one intent to save 30-40% gas. Use BlockDAG for lowest fees.

swap.explanation: This creates a swap intent that will: (1) Verify your USDC balance, (2) Get the best swap route, (3) Execute on Uniswap V3, (4) Deliver WETH to your wallet. Estimated gas: ~0.003 ETH.

stake.explanation: This stakes your ETH to earn ~5.2% APY. You receive stETH tokens that: (1) Represent your staked ETH, (2) Accumulate rewards daily, (3) Can be swapped anytime, (4) Are accepted as collateral for borrowing.

borrow.explanation: This supplies USDC to earn 7.2% APY while borrowing DAI at 8%. Your 10k USDC collateral supports borrowing up to 7.5k (75% LTV). Monitor to avoid liquidation at 80% LTV.

yield.explanation: This analyzes your holdings and recommends: (1) Move stables to USDT lending (+7.5%), (2) Stake idle ETH (+5.2%), (3) Use stETH as collateral for DAI borrow/reinvest.
